```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)

popup = c("Edinburgh Campus", "Glasgow Campus", "Inverness Campus")

leaflet() %>%
  setView(-1.074414, 54.614557, zoom = 5) %>%
  addProviderTiles("NASAGIBS.ViirsEarthAtNight2012") %>%
                     addMarkers(lng = c(-3.201930, -4.257987, -4.218300),
                                lat = c(55.947305, 55.865534, 57.477994),
                                popup = popup)
```
